simpleVR

Class SimpleOpenVR.SimpleVRRenderPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrtr.glrenderer.VRRenderPanel
      • simpleVR.SimpleOpenVR.SimpleVRRenderPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RenderPanel
    Enclosing class:
    SimpleOpenVR

    public static final class SimpleOpenVR.SimpleVRRenderPanel
extends VRRenderPanel
    An extension of OpenVRRenderPanel to provide a call-back function for initialization.
